response:
MRI is required to confirm the location and inflammatory nature of the lesions and to assess for dissemination in space (brain lesions). Serological testing for AQP4 and MOG antibodies is critical to distinguish MS from NMOSD/MOGAD as this alters long-term management. CSF analysis aids in diagnosing MS (oligoclonal bands) and ruling out infection.
